name: df-xmul
body: |- wceq(cxmu, cmpo(s0, s1, cxr, cxr, cif(nat0, cif(cpnf, cif(cmnf, co(cv(s0), cmul, cv(s1)), wo(wo(wa(wbr(nat0, clt, cv(s1)), wceq(cv(s0), cmnf)), wa(wbr(cv(s1), clt, nat0), wceq(cv(s0), cpnf))), wo(wa(wbr(nat0, clt, cv(s0)), wceq(cv(s1), cmnf)), wa(wbr(cv(s0), clt, nat0), wceq(cv(s1), cpnf))))), wo(wo(wa(wbr(nat0, clt, cv(s1)), wceq(cv(s0), cpnf)), wa(wbr(cv(s1), clt, nat0), wceq(cv(s0), cmnf))), wo(wa(wbr(nat0, clt, cv(s0)), wceq(cv(s1), cpnf)), wa(wbr(cv(s0), clt, nat0), wceq(cv(s1), cmnf))))), wo(wceq(cv(s0), nat0), wceq(cv(s1), nat0)))))
comment: Define multiplication over extended real numbers. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 20-Aug-2015.)
